aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: We are passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a difference.
aboutUs.missionText: Our mission is to deliver cutting-edge technology solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve their goals. We strive to create products that are not only functional but also intuitive and enjoyable to use.
aboutUs.visionText: We envision a world where technology seamlessly integrates into everyday life, making processes more efficient and enabling people to focus on what truly matters. Our goal is to be at the forefront of this transformation.
aboutUs.innovationText: We constantly push boundaries and explore new possibilities.
aboutUs.collaborationText: We believe in the power of teamwork and partnership.
aboutUs.excellenceText: We are committed to delivering the highest quality in everything we do.

aboutUsStory.title: We're just getting started
aboutUsStory.subtitle: At Toolbar AI, we're building tools that not only keep up with innovation but also make it simple, local, and impactful for everyone.
aboutUsStory.paragraph1: Toolbar AI was born from a simple but powerful idea: technology should understand you, not the other way around.
aboutUsStory.paragraph2: As AI tools were rapidly evolving around the world, we saw a gap — most solutions weren't built for the Uzbek language or the needs of local businesses. This made innovation harder to access and slowed down digital transformation in our region.
aboutUsStory.paragraph3: We started Toolbar AI to change that. Our mission was clear: make cutting-edge AI accessible, practical, and culturally relevant.
aboutUsStory.paragraph4: From a small team of engineers and designers, we've grown into a company creating AI agents and models that speak Uzbek, support local workflows, and empower businesses to scale faster.
aboutUsStory.paragraph5: Today, Toolbar AI is more than a product — it's a bridge between people and technology, helping teams, creators, and organizations unlock the full potential of AI.

aboutUsPage.heroTitle: Empowering the Future of AI in the Uzbek Language
